column1: Uchi////A verrrry festive group of 6 went for a birthday celebration
column2: and it was one of the best meals in recent memory. Or long term memory
column3: either.  Details are a bit fuzzy (lots of sake)
column4: but the overwhelming impression was  "MOREMOREMORE". We did both the 10 course tasting and the 6 course chef's special menus.  I recommend both
column5: but lean slightly towards the 6 course. Don't forget dessert...who knew Beets could be amazing (yes
